memes.title: Distracted Boyfriend
memes.description: Classic meme about a guy who got distracted by another girl while his girlfriend is nearby. Used to demonstrate preferences or choices between two options.

memes.title: Mocking SpongeBob
memes.description: SpongeBob with a chicken on his hand, used for mocking someone's words. The text is usually written in alternating case.

memes.title: Woman Yelling at Cat
memes.description: Meme with a yelling woman on the left and an unhappy cat at the table on the right. Used to demonstrate conflict situations or misunderstandings.

memes.title: Drake Hotline Bling
memes.description: Drake rejects one thing (top panel) and approves another (bottom panel). Ideal for comparing two options.

memes.title: Change My Mind
memes.description: Steven Crowder sitting at a table with a sign inviting to change his mind. Used for provocative statements.

memes.title: Bernie Sanders Mittens
memes.description: Bernie Sanders sitting at the inauguration with mittens and crossed arms. Used to show inertia. Became a viral meme in 2021.

memes.title: Expanding Brain
memes.description: Four panels with an expanding brain. Used to show progression of ideas from simple to absurd.

memes.title: Is This a Pigeon?
memes.description: Anime character pointing at a butterfly asking 'is this a pigeon?'. Used for incorrect identification of things.

memes.title: Two Buttons
memes.description: Person sweating, not knowing which of two buttons to press. Shows a difficult choice between two bad options.

memes.title: Disaster Girl
memes.description: Girl smiling ominously in front of a burning house. Used for schadenfreude or sabotage.
